meanings.definition: Any of a series of chemically similar metallic elements with atomic numbers ranging from 89 (actinium) to 103 (lawrencium).
meanings.sent1: Uranium is an actinide found in nature.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study actinides to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The actinide family reunion was full of colorful characters.
meanings.sent4: Her love for actinides shone as bright as a star.
meanings.sent5: The actinide's atomic number determines its place in the periodic table.

meanings.definition: A member of the actinide series.
meanings.sent1: Thorium is an actinide used in nuclear reactors.
meanings.sent2: She is a dedicated researcher focusing on actinides.
meanings.sent3: The actinide series party was a blast!
meanings.sent4: In the actinide series of elements, each member has unique characteristics.
meanings.sent5: The actinide series forms an important part of the periodic table.
